hero.title: Extended Warranty Services
hero.subtitle: Get the best in warranty protection with consumer protection warranty plan.

subtitle.p: We offer a wide range of plans to protect almost anything you own. Our plans have flexible and transparent contracts with no long-term commitment or hidden fees. We have done our homework and we understand your pain points. As a result, we are always on a path of discovering, addressing and preventing these pain points for our customers in the easiest way possible. Our claims process is easy, just give us a call and we will get back to you in no time..

If you have filed claims before, you know just how long that may take â€“ long enough to test your patience. But you need your phone fixed before work on Monday. Is there a faster way to file your claim? Join thousands of our happy customers to enjoy the best services in the industry and save thousands on repair and replacement bills.
